trans-unit.source: Represents the textual content of grammar elements defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il contenuto testuale degli elementi della grammatica definiti dallo standard [SRGS (Speech Recognition Grammar Specification) versione 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/) del World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> class represents the text found within a set of SRGS element tags.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> classe rappresenta il testo presente all'interno di un set di tag di elemento SRGS.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> object is constructed with a <xref:System.String> parameter, a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> object is created with its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> property initialized to the value of that parameter.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> oggetto viene costruito con un <xref:System.String> parametro, un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> oggetto viene creato con il relativo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> proprietà inizializzata sul valore del parametro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> object is then added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A> collection on the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> oggetto viene quindi aggiunto al <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A> insieme il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The following C# code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> class to modify the textual contents of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice c# seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> classe per modificare il contenuto testuale di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The example changes the initial text values of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects (`Large`, `Larger`, and `Largest`) to `Small`, `Medium`, and `Large`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio vengono modificati i valori di testo iniziale del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> oggetti (`Large`, `Larger`, e `Largest`) per `Small`, `Medium`, e `Large`, rispettivamente.

trans-unit.source: The following shows how the modified text of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects would appear as `item` elements in the output XML grammar file.
trans-unit.target: Nella seguente come la modifica testo del <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> oggetti appariranno come `item` elementi nel file di grammatica XML di output.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" />.

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> class.
trans-unit.target: Questo è il costruttore predefinito per il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> classe.

trans-unit.source: The value used to set the <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text" /> property on the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Il valore utilizzato per impostare la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text" /> sull'istanza <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" /> class, specifying the text of the instance.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" />, specificando il testo dell'istanza.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text contained within the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" /> class instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il testo contenuto all’interno dell'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" />.

trans-unit.source: The text contained within the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText" /> instance.
An attempt is made to set <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text" /> to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Si è tentato di impostare <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text" /> su <see langword="null" />.
